definition: (bird species of China) barn swallow (Hirundo rustica)

home/family/(polite) my (sister, uncle etc)/classifier for families or businesses/refers to the philosophical schools of pre-Han China/noun suffix for a specialist in some activity, such as a musician or revolutionary, corresponding to English -ist, -er, -ary or -ian/CL:個|个[ge4]

Yan, a vassal state of Zhou in modern Hebei and Liaoning/north Hebei/the four Yan kingdoms of the Sixteen Kingdoms, namely: Former Yan 前燕 (337-370), Later Yan 後燕|后燕 (384-409), Southern Yan 南燕 (398-410), Northern Yan 北燕 (409-436)/surname Yan

sentences.english: Many house swallows perch themselves on the roof of the house.
sentences.chinese: 許多家燕飛落在屋頂上。

sentences.english: Nancy Sit fans may also share their Nancy Sit photos if they wish.
sentences.chinese: 燕迷“也可以分享他們的家燕姐照片。
